title: Add 1P/2P mode selection menu
description: Need a menu screen to select between 1-player and 2-player mode before starting the game.

title: Core Game Engine
description: Game loop, canvas rendering, collision detection, and maze system

title: Implement game loop with requestAnimationFrame
description: Create a smooth 60fps game loop using requestAnimationFrame, managing game state updates and rendering cycle

title: Create maze data structure and renderer
description: Define maze layout as 2D array, render walls using CSS/canvas with neon glow effect

title: Implement tile-based collision detection
description: Detect collisions between entities and maze walls, dots, and power pellets
close_reason: Implemented tile-based collision system with AABB wall detection, wall sliding, entity collision, and dot collision utilities

title: Build game state manager
description: Manage game states: menu, playing, paused, game-over. Handle state transitions
close_reason: Implemented game state manager with menu, playing, paused, and game-over states

title: gt done incorrectly reports 0 commits ahead when branch has 5 commits
description: On branch polecat/furiosa-mjz3lv4w, 'git log origin/main..HEAD --oneline' shows 5 commits, but 'gt done' says '0 commits ahead of main; nothing to merge'. This blocked the normal completion flow.
close_reason: Not a bug - main had already been updated to f9e1c54. gt done correctly identified no unique commits.

title: Maximize game to fill entire window
description: Make the game MUCH bigger - nearly fill the entire browser window. Scale up all visual elements (Pac-Man, ghosts, pellets, maze walls) with more pixels per item. Do NOT add more maze tiles or pellets - just scale up the existing elements to be visually larger. Use viewport units (vw/vh) to maximize screen usage.
close_reason: Implemented maximize game to fill window: increased TILE_SIZE from 24 to 32, updated CSS to use 100vw/100vh viewport units, hidden UI elements to maximize game space

title: Add animated score counter when points are earned
description: When the player earns points (eating dots, ghosts, fruit), the score currently jumps instantly to the new value. Add an animated counter that visually ticks up to the new score, similar to classic arcade games. This makes scoring feel more satisfying and rewarding.
close_reason: Implemented animated score counter using useAnimatedScore hook with requestAnimationFrame

title: Ghost pen in wrong location - should be center of maze
description: Ghost pen/house is at bottom left instead of center of maze. In classic Pac-Man, the ghost house is in the CENTER of the maze. Fix ghost spawn positions and ghost house bounds to be centered horizontally in the maze.
close_reason: Fixed by pm-kv5 (pm-50x merge) - nux corrected ghost positions for the actual 20x15 maze, placing ghost pen in center

title: Implement Pac-Man death and respawn on ghost collision
description: When no power-up is active and a ghost overlaps with Pac-Man, Pac-Man should die (play death animation) and respawn at starting position. Lives should decrement. Game over when lives reach 0.

title: Ghosts are not moving
close_reason: Fixed ghost initial direction from LEFT to UP when exiting ghost house - LEFT was blocked by wall

title: Implement ghost pen with proper spawn behavior
description: Ghosts should start inside a ghost pen (ghost house) in the center of the maze. They should visually bump around inside the pen before being released one by one. They should NOT spawn randomly or outside the pen. Implement proper ghost house mechanics like the original Pac-Man.
close_reason: Implemented ghost pen with bouncing behavior and one-by-one release

title: Create game store with initial state and actions
description:
- Create src/store/gameStore.js with initial state shape
- Migrate state properties from createInitialState()
- Implement actions: startGame, pauseGame, resumeGame, resetGame
- Implement actions: setGameMode, updatePlayerPosition, updatePlayer2Position
- Implement tick action for game loop state updates
close_reason: Implemented gameStore.js with all required actions

title: Slow down Pac-Man movement speed
description: Pac-Man moves too fast. Reduce movement speed for more authentic gameplay.
close_reason: Reduced PLAYER_SPEED from 6 to 4 tiles per second in App.jsx

title: Migrate components to use Zustand store
description:
Update these components to use useGameStore instead of props:
- App.jsx
- ScoreDisplay.jsx
- ModeSelectScreen.jsx
- StartScreen.jsx
- PauseOverlay.jsx
- GameOverScreen.jsx
- LevelCompleteScreen.jsx
close_reason: All 7 components migrated to useGameStore. Build passes.

title: Fix ghosts starting in wrong state - should be dangerous not edible
description: Ghosts currently start in an edible/frightened state. This is wrong. Ghosts should start in their normal chase/scatter mode where they can KILL Pac-Man. They should ONLY become edible (blue/frightened) when Pac-Man eats a power pellet. Fix the initial ghost state.
close_reason: Fixed: Player was starting on power pellet at tile (1,1), immediately triggering frightened mode. Moved player start position to tile (2,4).

The high score should persist in localStorage between sessions. Display it prominently, perhaps in the center section above or below the level indicator.
close_reason: Implemented high score display with localStorage persistence

close_reason: Ghost rendering already integrated in App.jsx lines 278-363, with mode-based display (IN_HOUSE/EATEN/FRIGHTENED), per-ghost colors, and proper AI updates
